title: Add LinkedIn social link to footer

requirements.summary: Add a LinkedIn icon link to the Footer component pointing to https://www.linkedin.com/company/safarx-in/?viewAsMember=true, placed alongside the existing Instagram social media icon/link
acceptanceCriteria: A LinkedIn icon is visible in the footer's social media links section
Clicking the LinkedIn icon opens https://www.linkedin.com/company/safarx-in/?viewAsMember=true in a new tab
The LinkedIn icon is styled consistently with the existing Instagram icon
The link has rel='noopener noreferrer' for security

file_operations.description: Add a LinkedIn social media link alongside the existing Instagram link in the footer's social media section. Import the Linkedin icon from lucide-react and add a new anchor element with href='https://www.linkedin.com/company/safarx-in/?viewAsMember=true', target='_blank', rel='noopener noreferrer', styled consistently with the Instagram link including hover effects and sizing.
